description:
“Coloring Book for Kids and Adults – Free Drawing” is a brand new color app that is now available to you 24/7! Enjoy drawing with this incredible and funny app and you will certainly feel as if you are a true artist! A great variety of picture awaits you! Mandala, animals, flowers and many other designs! Explore completely new dimensions of digital coloring! This coloring book provides you with very many illustrations sorted through different categories. This awesome free app can relief you from stress and everyday anxiety! Relax with the best color therapy and start enjoying this funny app even today!

- 8 new categories and 20 different illustrations per each category are now at your disposal!
- Easy to color – you just need to tap to select a palette and pick a color!
- Tap to paint and pinch to zoom in/out!
- Many interesting picture designs to paint: mandala, patterns, animals, florals, gardens, famous paintings and more!
- It contains a music player - choose the tune you want to listen to while coloring!
- You can save and share your masterpieces via Facebook, Instagram, Messenger and Pinterest!
- This amazing app works offline so you don't need to have Internet connection!

This awesome app contains an easy to use interface so everyone can paint using this coloring book app! This app is something you should not miss! Grab it even today and see wonders of relaxation! Use mandala or famous painting and be an artist yourself! Choose among different color shades, filters and effects and paint a wonderful picture in your own way! Show to your friends and family how creative you can be! With this app, everyone can be an artist! Play relaxing music, paint and think about nothing! Let the music and colorful designs do their best! You will certainly feel better! Try it right away and you won't regret! Save your works and share them via social networks! The best of everything is that this app is for free! Can you think of any valid reason not to download it? We neither!
